title: Antibiotics in ag leads to new disease organisms

content.prompt: The development of dangerous strains of disease organisms represents a significant consequence of which of the following agricultural practices?

choices.label: Using herbicides in mechanized, large-scale grain farming
Using plant-based insecticidal compounds on vegetable crops
Growing crops that are genetically modified for increased yields
Including the use of legumes into croprotation protocols
Incorporating antibiotics into the feeding regimens of densely concentrated livestock
